idea-plugin.name: Transloco Overlay
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful translation management tool for Transloco in Angular projects. Create, edit, and navigate translations directly from your HTML templates.

‚ú® Key Features

  • Create Translations from Selection - Select text in HTML, Ctrl+Shift+Click to instantly create a new translation key
  • Existing Translation Detection - Automatically finds if your selected text already exists as a translation to avoid duplicates
  • Smart Parameter Detection - Detects Angular interpolations like {{user.name}} and converts them to transloco params
  • TRANSLOCO_SCOPE Detection - Auto-detects scoped translations from your component's providers
  • Real-time Key Validation - Shows warnings if a translation key already exists while you type
  • Method Selector - Choose between Pipe (| transloco) or Directive (t('key')) syntax
  • Directive Context Detection - Automatically detects *transloco variable names and scopes

üîß Navigation & Editing

  • Hover over translation keys to see values across all languages
  • Ctrl+Click on keys in HTML to navigate to JSON translation files
  • Ctrl+Shift+Click on existing keys to open multi-language editor
  • Ctrl+Shift+Click on keys in JSON to find usages in templates
  • Autocomplete for translation keys with preview
  • Google Translate integration for auto-translation

üìÅ Supported Patterns

  • {{ 'key' | transloco }} - Pipe syntax
  • {{ 'key' | transloco:{ param: value } }} - Pipe with params
  • [transloco]="'key'" - Attribute binding
  • transloco="key" - Direct attribute
  • t('key') with *transloco directive - Structural directive

üè¢ Enterprise Ready

  • Support for Nx monorepo scoped translations
  • Works with multiple translation file locations
  • Remembers your last used location and method preferences

Open Source & AI Transparency

This plugin was created using AI (Claude by Anthropic). The source code is fully open source on GitHub for review. You are encouraged to inspect the code, report issues, or fork it for your internationalization needs.
